verses.roman:
'iṅha more kanyā dite karyāche aṅgīkāra
ebe ye nā dena, pucha iṅhāra vyavahāra'

synonyms: iṅha—this gentleman; more—to me; kanyā—his daughter; dite—to give in charity; karyāche—has made; aṅgīkāra—promise; ebe—now; ye—indeed; nā—not; dena—he gives; pucha—kindly ask; iṅhāra—of him; vyavahāra—the behavior.
translation: "This gentleman has promised to hand over his daughter to me, yet now he does not follow his promise. Please ask him about his behavior."
